EmailTemplate.name: RE: Getting Claude Hill setup with MBO (1385069125.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Getting Claude Hill setup with MBO (1385069125.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Claude , It’s nice to meet you via email. I wanted to follow up on the email below and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Lamont Lucas [mailto:lamont@fastrobot.com] Sent: Thursday, November 21, 2013 4:14 PM To: Chill Tech; Sara Conde; Megan Craft Cc: John Cook Subject: Getting Claude Hill setup with MBO Hey Claude, We're excited to work with you, and I'll send over a contracting agreement to you shortly. In the meantime, I'd like to start the process of enrolling you with MBO Partners as we'd briefly discussed earlier. I think Sara will do the necessaries, but the end result is that you'll be a W2 employee of MBO Partners, and on a weekly basis (by 5pm friday) you'll enter your hours worked both in the clarity system at The Gap and in the MBO form. At the end of the month MBO will invoice us for your hours, we'll pay them and they'll pay you. I used MBO for many years and liked them. I suggest looking into and taking advantage of their SEP additions to their 401k plan We're aiming for a 12/2 start date, which I hope is doable even with your planned trip to MD.
